room_title: Escape room "Mission Black and White" by Code To Escape in Daytona Beach
room_address: 119 S Palmetto Ave Daytona Beach, FL 32114
room_description: There are many uniformists out there. The most radical is the ultra uniformist Go Grey Group (GGG). They have a vision: to turn the world black and white. In fact, black and white is mostly grey. A greyscale world isn't fun! The uniformist group is really close to eliminating all of the colors from our world. You can be a hero today; just complete the mission Black and White! Your team has 60 minutes to restore color to the world. Solve the problems and find the final secret color sequence which will open the door to the colorful world and let the real colors flood the GGG.
